content:
Please respond to this poll or at least consider your position on this before Wednesday's SIG Registry meeting:
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/SIG-Registries/discussions/46

recording SIG Registries meetings 路 Discussion #46 路 bytecodealliance/SIG-Registries
In the last SIG Registry meeting, we discussed the idea of recording meetings. Many organizations that develop around open source communities consider recording meetings part of developing in the o...
